Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which we believe has the potential to revolutionize your operations and significantly enhance your business outcomes. Given its innovative features and high-quality standards, we estimate its value to be well above $800000. Considering the immense benefits it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $1200000. This exceptional opportunity not only secures your competitive edge but also ensures a long-term partnership with us. We look forward to discussing how this product can transform your business and welcome any questions you might have. Let's seize this moment to elevate your company to new heights. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $1,200,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $1,200,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
